title: Travel through the Underdark
content:
lead us to Moonrise Towers.

Travel through the Underdark Walkthrough

You can travel to Moonrise Towers through the Underdark. You can reach Underdark from Defiled Temple, Whispering Depth, or Zhentarim Basement. The quests in Underdark includeï¼š Avenge Glut's Circle Cure the Poisoned Gnome Defeat the Duergar Intruders Deliver Nere's Head Find the Missing Boots Find the Mushroom Picker Free True Soul Nere Blind the Absolute Find Explosives Save the Grymforge Gnomes The Adamantine Forge Get Past
